project.name: sound
project.description: The sound team provides and maintains sound applications and drivers.

longdescription.p: The Sound team strives to provide users with the best sound experience through providing sound applications and drivers including alsa, audacious, amarok and such.

dev.description: Herd Lead, Audacious and plugins, libnjb

How to Enable Realtime for Multimedia Applications

body.p: It's not uncommon that a package is part of sound herd but have a direct maintainer. To avoid misunderstanding, such packages are to be considered maintained by that developer, leaving the herd as a fallback for when the maintainer is away for too much time. Always try to get a hold of the direct maintainer before touching a package that has a direct maintainer.
